summary:
Do you find it strange that you can pick a master lock with lockpicking skill 1?
Here is the solution for that!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/4599/buttonfinaltest1.png[/img]

[img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/9080/buttonfinaltest2.png[/img]

[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/8739/buttonfinaltest3.png[/img]
[youtube]Ddr_w0MbbhU[/youtube]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=Ddr_w0MbbhU[/youtube]
[size=+2][center][color=grey][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[size=+2][center][color=black][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/a/img706/620/mcmfeaturesscaled.png][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img706/620/mcmfeaturesscaled.th.png[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/706/mcmfeaturesscaled.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img706/620/mcmfeaturesscaled.th.png[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/571/mcmgeneralscaled.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img571/8596/mcmgeneralscaled.th.png[/IMG][/URL]



[img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/3587/logotesttl.png[/img]







[center][img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/1026/logoghg.png[/img][/center]
[size=+1.5][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI version 3.0+[/Url] is required.[/b][/size]
[size=+1.5][center][img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4390/buttonfinaldescription.png[/img][/center][/size][size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][Size=+1.5]
Lockpicking was always a boring and useless skill for me it was more like a minigame which icreases your level as well as giving you rewards when you solved the really easy game.
For me the issues with the vanilla lock system are:[/size]

[list][size=+1.5]
[*]If you don\'t play a thief character you don\'t want to level up your lockpicking skill. But you also don\'t want to miss the loot. So you end up leveling your lockpicking skill even if you dont want to. (happens to me atleast all the time)
[*]You can pick the lock of a master chest with an Lockpick skill of 1.
[*]a lot of people don\'t like the \"minigame\". (me included)[/list][/size]
[size=+1.5]So i overhauled the lock system to add more options and make them overall more interessting. My general goal is it to make it feel like these features are supposed to be in the game.
For more informations look at the section below (Features).[/size] [size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size]

[center][img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/1681/buttonfinalfeatures.png[/img][/center][size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][size=+1.5]
[u]MCM Menu:[/u]
A fully customizable MCM menu with alot of settings.

[u]Plugin identification:[/u]
For best compatibility this mod automaticly identifies plugins and changes the behaviour of this mod to be compatible. (currently included plugins: SKSE, SkyRe)

[u]Lock Requirements:[/u]
When this feature is activated locks get a skill requirement (depending on the type of lock and the settings you choosed). If you don\'t got the required amount of skill you have a 100% chance to fail picking the lock.

[u]Smash Locks:[/u]
You are a Warrior type? Just enable this feature, get your weapon out and smash the next lock you pass by like a real man. Also Increases your weapon skill, toggles crime and more. In short it just acts like you would expect. 

[u]Unlock Spell:[/u]
If you enable this you will be grant with a Spell (Alteration), which manipulates the lock mechanism itself, causing the lock to open. (ofc only if you got the required skill)
Same as with Smash Locks, it toggles crime, increases your alteration skill and so on.

[u]Auto Pick:[/u]
Gives you the option to automaticly pick the lock, it will consume lockpicks and increase your lockpicking skill (or fingersmith if skyre is installed). Uses the same settings as the feature: Lock Requirement.[/size]
[size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size]

[center][img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/9858/buttonfinalcompatibilit.png[/img][/center][size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][size=+1.5] I always focused on best possible compatibility with my mods. In this mod i also included different algorythm to detect mods which might be incompatible and then react to them to prevent any issues. What i did for high compatibility:[/size]

[list][size=+1.5]
[*] This mod doesn\'t touch any Object or reference directly.
[*] Every skill increasment is used with the vanilla formular. Means if you got a mod which makes leveling skill x faster/slower these changes will also apply to my mod most likely.
[*] Recognizing plugins which would conflic to the mod and react automaticly to prevent issues (especially focused on SkyRe)
[*] Cleaned the mod (actually i never had to clean it, it is clean since always. (checked with TES5Edit))[/size]
[/list][size=+1.5]
If you found a mod which is incompatible please tell me via PM or in the comments I might make them compatible.
[/size][size=+1.5][color=grey]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/color][/size]





[size=+3][center][color=green][b][u]Lock Requirement[/u][/b][/color][/size][/center]
[size=+1.5]Do you find it strange that you can pick a master lock with lockpicking skill 1?
[b]Here is the solution for that![/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17418-1-1337978354.jpg[/img]

The Script adds a requirement for every locked container [b][u](only works for containers (like chest\'s) atm)[/u][/b] 
This mod was originally featured in my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17037]TIP - Thief improvement project[/url] but i thought it would be nice to have a stand alone version from it aswell. Additionally i added the lockpick tweaks from my other mod aswell.

There are 3 Files to choose from:[/size]

[size=+1.5][b]Hard lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]Master locks now need: 100 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 75 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 25 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]

[size=+1.5][b]Medium lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=+1.5]Master locks now need: 75 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 25 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 0 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]

[size=+1.5][b]Easy lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=+1.5]Master locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 25 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 0 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 0 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]
[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[size=+2][color=green][b]Known issue:[/b][/color][/size]

[size=+1.5]If you load a save game where you are in a Cell (for example a house) with a locked container the script lets you try to pick the container [u]one time[/u].[/size]

[size=+2][center][color=green]
[b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[color=green][b][size=+2]Installation:[/size][/b][/color]

[size=+1.5][u]NMM installation:[/u][/size]
[size=+1.5]Just press the download with manager button, follow the instructions, pick the files you want and make sure the .esp\'s are activated. Enjoy :)[/size]

[size=+1.5][u]Manual installation:[/u][/size]
[size=+1.5]Copy the files you want in your skyrim/data folder and activate them.
You have to put the .pex file in the skyrim/data/scripts folder.
Make sure you only picked one file of each category[/size]

[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[color=green][b][size=+2]Final words:[/size][/b][/color]
[color=red][size=+1.5][u]Note:[/u]
This is only the Beta version so i\'m probably changing things in the future.[/size][/color]

[size=+1.5]Have fun :)
p.s I would like to get some feedback :)[/size]

[color=orange][size=+1.5]I want to say thanks to the german TES forum [url=http://www.scharesoft.de/]Scharesoft[/url] especially to Kahmul who helped me much.[/size][/color]
